title: Salt and hypertension: how to save your life
brief_description: Gloria Taylor, public health educator presents the evidence suggesting that we can minimize the risk of high blood pressure by reducing salt intake. Examines the sodium content of a typical daily menu and shows how to use herbs and spices to replace sodium.
